Name: Copy styles as JS
Description: Can I copy style declarations as JavaScript object?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Notes: 1. Inspect element > In the **Styles** pane, right click on the style declaration and select "Copy declaration as JS" or "Copy all declarations as JS" to copy one or all styles.
Chrome.Name: Copy styles as JS

Edge.Notes: 1. Inspect element > In the **Styles** pane, right click on the style declaration and select "Copy declaration as JS" or "Copy all declarations as JS" to copy one or all styles.
Edge.Name: Copy styles as JS
Edge.References: [1] "What's new in DevTools 93?", by Edge Devtools [Docs](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/devtools-guide-chromium/whats-new/2021/07/devtools#copy-a-declaration-in-the-styles-pane-for-css-in-js-libraries)

Opera.Notes: 1. Inspect element > In the **Styles** pane, right click on the style declaration and select "Copy declaration as JS" or "Copy all declarations as JS" to copy one or all styles.
Opera.Name: Copy styles as JS
